original_text: But the woman was given the two wings of the great eagle so that she might fly from the serpent into the wilderness, to the place where she is to be nourished for a time, and times, and half a time.
korean_text: 그 여자가 큰 독수리의 두 날개를 받아 광야 자기 곳으로 날아가 거기서 그 뱀의 낯을 피하여 한 때와 두 때와 반 때를 양육 받으매

sentences.original_text: But the woman was given the two wings of the great eagle
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 여자에게는 큰 독수리의 두 날개가 주어졌으니

sentences.original_text: so that she might fly from the serpent
to the place where she is to be nourished
